content: svaṟggasthanāya ñaṅṅaḷuṭe pitāvē! / niṉṟe tirunāmaṁ pariśuddhamākkappeṭaṇame. / niṉṟe rājyaṁ varaṇame. / tiruviṣṭaṁ svaṟggattileppōle bhūmiyiluṁ ākaṇame. / ñaṅṅaḷkk āvaśyamāya appaṁ innu ñaṅṅaḷkku taraṇame. / ñaṅṅaḷuṭe kaṭakkārōṭu ñaṅṅaḷ kṣamiccatupōle / ñaṅṅaḷuṭe kaṭaṅṅaḷuṁ pāpaṅṅaḷuṁ ñaṅṅaḷōṭu kṣamikkaṇame. / parīkṣayilēkku ñaṅṅaḷe pravēśippikkarutē. / pinneyō duṣṭanilninn ñaṅṅaḷe rakṣiccukoḷḷaṇame. / entennāl rājyavuṁ / śaktiyuṁ/ mahatvavuṁ / ennēykkuṁ ninakkuḷḷatākunnu. āmmīṉ.
